name: accord-qldb-lambda
description: A set of Lambda functions to deploy and execute an Accord Project Smart Legal Contract

scripts.package: sam package --template-file ../template.yaml --s3-bucket sam-us-east-1-272769237722 > ../.aws-sam/build/template-orig.yaml && cat ../.aws-sam/build/template-orig.yaml | sed 's/Uploading.*//' > ../.aws-sam/build/template.yaml && rm ../.aws-sam/build/template-orig.yaml
scripts.runLocal: rm -rf ./lib && cp -r ../lib . && sam local invoke -e tests/event.json -t fcn.yaml
scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha -r tests/**/* --reporter spec

author: Nikolay Vlasov
